tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.2.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Shadow
programme.desc: A civilian tech rep aboard a submarine seizes control of an experimental torpedo after its launch during an exercise.

programme.title: JAG: déjà vu (AKA Soldier of Love)
programme.desc: Three Navy lieutenants die by homicide in 11 months around Washington. Harm and Meg investigate.

programme.title: JAG: Desert Son
programme.desc: Due to a human error in an exercise, artillery fire injures seven Marines, one of whom later dies.

programme.title: JAG: Brig Break
programme.desc: A sailor has stolen two Stinger missiles from a base. Harm and Meg investigate.

programme.title: JAG: Pilot Error
programme.desc: Two Naval aviators die in a crash of an F-14 while using a new fly-by-wire navigation system.

programme.title: Scorpion: The Old College Try
programme.desc: Team Scorpion goes undercover at a university to find a hacker who infiltrates the Federal Reserve and threatens to collapse the world economy.

programme.title: Scorpion: Dam Breakthrough
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, Team Scorpion must prevent a catastrophe when torrential rains create a large crack in a dam, threatening to wipe out an entire town in its wake.

programme.title: Scorpion: White Out
programme.desc: In order to save a United States Special Forces unit from certain death, Team Scorpion must brave the subzero temperatures of Antarctica.

programme.title: Scorpion: Sun of a Gun
programme.desc: Sylvester comes face to face with his estranged father who asks Team Scorpion for help.

programme.title: Scorpion: Da Bomb
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is helping with NASA's top secret rocket launch, but they must sabotage their own mission.

programme.title: Scorpion: Fractured
programme.desc: After a powerful earthquake rocks Los Angeles, Team Scorpion must fix a pinched gas line to prevent a massive explosion.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: God’s Good Grace
programme.desc: While Swarek is brutally interrogated by Jamie Brennan in the basement of a Pickering farmhouse, the rookies help Andy solve a mystery that may reveal Swarek’s location.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Fresh Paint
programme.desc: Andy McNally’s first shift on the job turns into mayhem when shots are fired in a downtown rooming house. In the midst of the chaos, Andy triumphantly makes her first big arrest.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Mercury Retrograde
programme.desc: As the other rookies hunt down a dangerous escaped convict, Swarek drags Andy through his undercover hauntson a mission he won’t explain. At first, Andy assumes Swarek is a rogue cop trying to settle scores from his undercover days.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Fite Nite
programme.desc: While working on a high-stakes gun raid, Andy and Gail stumble upon a victim of domestic abuse whose brutal experience in the system has taught her not to trust the police.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Signals Crossed
programme.desc: Andy’s undercover skills are tested –and found to be lacking –during a citywidecampaign to clean up the streets, whenshe’s tapped to pose as a prostitute in order to arrest unsuspecting johns.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Broad Daylight
programme.desc: A home invasion at an upscale address leads to a massive first response call that brings out the training officers in full force. After the scene is cleared, Andy and Traci remain behind with the terrified homeowner.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Tivoli Venue
programme.desc: A well-known venue for accomplished as well as up and coming bands The Tivoli Venue boasts many a ghost. In this episode one of the team gets a warning from the other side that reduces them to tears and something seems to be stalking the team.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Wentworth Woodhouse Part 1
programme.desc: Part 1. The upper floors of Wentworth House are a maze of corridors and rooms and the team have one night to investigate as many as possible. With one whistling spirit, groans and loud noises the team are shaken to their core.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Wentworth Woodhouse Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2. The underbelly of this great house is a sharp contrast to its upper grandeur. Some members of the team are forced to run while other are lost in the labyrinth of tunnels and passageways pursued by something unnatural.

programme.title: Most Haunted: 30 East Drive_PT1
programme.desc: 30 East Drive is said to house the most violent poltergeist in the world. The team go head first into what becomes their toughest challenge yet. As soon as they enter the property something is waiting and wants to be known.

programme.title: Most Haunted: 30 East Drive_PT2
programme.desc: The team continue their most threatening investigation yet and for some they will be scared for life mentally and physically. The most violent poltergeist in the world is ready for a fight...but who wins?

programme.title: Most Haunted: Armley Mills
programme.desc: Once the centre of industry Armley Mills is now a museum that is said to house the phantoms of many a lost soul. From children who were caught in the machinery to a bad tempered floorwalker who doesn’t like people in his mill.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Century of Haunting
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Oxford, Massachusetts to help a family in need. The house has been in the Voas family for two generations, and lots of activity has been reported, from apparitions to shadow figures.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Don't Feed the Apparition
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS revisits a familiar city, Alexandria, Louisiana, but this time, they're there to investigate the Alexandria Zoo.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Sloss Furnaces
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Alabama to investigate Sloss Furnaces, a 50-acre industrial plantoperating from 1882 until the 1970s.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Hyde & Seek
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Cooperstown, New York, to investigate Hyde Hall.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Soul Searching
programme.desc: For the first time ever, TAPS revisits Belcourt Castle in Newport, Rhode Island to investigate claims surrounding a deceased friend.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Shards of Rimni
programme.desc: Dylan is framed for murder and must clear his name while finding the pieces of a vase said to grant the owner the "blessings of the cosmos.

programme.title: Andromeda: Mad to Be Saved
programme.desc: The crew rescues a group of refugees, only to discover they have been subject to government experiments and are extremely unstable.

programme.title: Andromeda: Cui Bono
programme.desc: Beka's uncle runs for office in the New Commonwealth, but an assassination attempt causes the crew to act as his security.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Lone and Level Sands
programme.desc: When the Andromeda is attacked by space pirates, they are rescued by a long-lost spaceship from Earth.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The crew discovers that a rogue planet, Marduk, has been creating weapons of mass destruction.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Leper's Kiss
programme.desc: A hitman by the name of the Leper is targeting the leaders of the New Commonwealth.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.167
programme.desc: Woman claims ex-husband owes $16k in child support arrears; he sues for overpayment. Man sues alleged bar assailant; defendant claims Good Samaritan role.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.146
programme.desc: A man denies popping the tires and smashing the truck windows of his ex-girlfriend’s new boyfriend’s vehicle in a jealous rampage.\t\t\t\r\nEx-lovers accuse each other of having drug problems during a fight over an alleged loan for a motorcycle.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.24
programme.desc: Babysitter accused of falsely claiming ex-employer smoked marijuana in front of child/Gallery owner denies scamming customer, claims heirloom sapphire sold for alleged ten dollars.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.177
programme.desc: Woman's front teeth cracked when intoxicated dancer trips and knocks into her at bar. Dancer denies wrongdoing. 15-year-old accused of breaking pizzeria window denies involvement but refuses to implicate friend. Police provide different account.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.210
programme.desc: Unwed parents fight over the return of furniture, an unpaid cell phone bill, and an incarcerated ex-boyfriend.\t\t\t\r\nA landlord is suing a former tenant for damage to her rental property.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.186
programme.desc: A young man denies killing a teen's dog during their graduation party. Intoxicated teenagers prompt neighbors to call police, leading to a dispute over a broken apartment lease between feuding ex-roommates.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.241
programme.desc: A man describes his relationship as "friends with benefits" with a woman who claims she lent him money for living expenses. A woman sues her former live-in boyfriend for home renovation costs and furniture expenses.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.84
programme.desc: A contract between cousins to ‘share’ a Pontiac Grand Am ends with a fight over the return of the car with allegedly ‘missing’ speakers/A fight over a three-way gym membership leaves a young woman at odds with her ex-boyfriend and his best friend.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.178
programme.desc: Two women fight at a Halloween party over wearing the same costume, disputing their relationship with the Sheriff’s department. A woman crashes her co-worker's car into oncoming traffic, admitting she was driving without a license.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.218
programme.desc: A man is allegedly chased out of a bar and viciously attacked after being accused of stealing a woman’s purse.\t\t\t\r\nA man hits black ice and has a wreck in his brother’s ex-girlfriend’s car; she sues him for damages.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.137
programme.desc: Alleged assault, vandalism, and marijuana use are the source of\t\t\t\r\ncontention between a woman and her nephew’s ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The 14th series of Gordon Ramsay's fiercely fought chef challenge concludes. The top two chefs visit previous winner Christina Wilson in Las Vegas for some motivation, before preparing five dishes to be judged by top chefs.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: This season's contestants head to Las Vegas where they participate in the signature dish challenge; the winners of the challenge ride on the world's tallest Ferris wheel while the losers peel 50 pounds of shrimp and 1,000 pounds of potatoes.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams have 20 minutes to see which team can produce the most shrimp dumplings; rapper The Game attends the dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs are given a communication challenge. VIP guests for dinner service include astronaut Buzz Aldrin.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Kris Jenner and Dita Von Teese enjoy duck dishes as one team pulls off a near-perfect dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The winners of this week's challenge enjoy a wine blending experience, before a disastrous dinner service leads to a shock departure.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dina Dwyer-Owens, the Chairwoman and CEO of The Dwyer Group, which is the parent company to a collection of franchise brands specializing in home and vehicle maintenance, goes undercover posing as a contestant on a show called Keep Your Day Job.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Catherine Monson is the driving force behind Fastsigns which is America’s largest custom sign franchise company. During her journey, Catherine finds out it’s really the personal discoveries that make this experience a life-changing one.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Stacey Mowbray, CEO of Canada’s largest specialty coffee company goes undercover and gets into the grind serving lattes to get an edge on customer service and revive her connection with frontline workers.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Mark King, the CEO of the world’s top golf equipment brand, Taylor Made, goes undercover as Al Bower, an unemployed golf enthusiast trying to land his dream job in the golf industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Tervita specializes in environmental clean-up for Western Canada’s booming energy and mining industries. It doesn’t take long for Fory Musser,.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Inane Clown Posse
programme.desc: Froy and Matt have to wrangle with some angry clowns when they try to repossess a bouncy castle. Meanwhile, Lou and Sonia lose patience with a debtor over a recycling truck.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Doggin' and Draggin'
programme.desc: When Carlos plays a repossession prank that almost lands Matt and Froy in jail, Lou tasks Froy with burying the hatchet.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Raising the Roof
programme.desc: Sonia and Froy deal with an unbalanced debtor who threatens to take down the entire company, while Matt and Ronnie take on children's book vendors who are up to no good.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Revenge
programme.desc: Matt and Froy take the opportunity to enact revenge on Ronnie and Carlos; a repo at a car wash gets out of hand; Lou's big mistake on a repo results in a debtor bringing the fight to their front door in a shootout.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Gypsy Hunter
programme.desc: Reeling from the shootout, Lou tracks down one of the culprits and enacts an elaborate plot of revenge with the help of Froy and Carlos.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Gypsy Barbeque!
programme.desc: When Matt and Froy repo a car from an anger management meeting, Froy suffers the consequences of taking on a violent rage-aholic.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Up in Flames
programme.desc: A jazz musician sets off Sonia and punches are thrown as Ronnie tries to manage the mayhem, and Matt and Sonia wrestle to bring deluded actors back to reality.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Gypsy Games
programme.desc: When Rusty leads Sonia and Ronnie on a wild goose chase, Sonia loses her cool and puts her foot down with Lou.

programme.title: Operation Repo: T-Bone Trouble
programme.desc: The team's work with anger management starts to pay off - with disastrous consequences. Matt and Sonia get into a standoff with a wealthy divorcee, his daughter, and her raging boyfriend.

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Young and the Restless
programme.desc: After Adam has too many restless nights sleeping in Jennifer’s small bed, he brings home the bed he shared with his ex-girlfriend which causes a fight and leads them tossing out all memories of past relationships.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Hard Day's Night
programme.desc: Jennifer tries to help Jeff’s sore neck with a massage until the situation between them becomes uncomfortable and upsets Audrey. Meanwhile, Russell brings Adam along to help him fight off a school yard bully so Russell can get close to the teacher.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Kids
programme.desc: Adam and Jennifer’s plans for a romantic weekend fall apart after they argue about their different feelings toward careers, finances, and kids. Meanwhile, Audrey is having second thoughts about why she and Jeff have waited so long to have children.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Game on
programme.desc: After Adam buys an expensive video-game console, Jennifer makes him promise to discuss major purchases first, but Russell interferes and makes Adam question the agreement.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff's Wooby
programme.desc: Audrey surprises Jeff by making quilt out of his old t-shirts but regrets her gift when he doesn't stop telling the stories that are behind the shirts.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Mr. Fix-It
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey tackle marital communication issues while Adam and Jennifer discover whether creating a home-made 'videotape' will spice up their love life.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Flirting With Disaster
programme.desc: Adam enjoys stealing the attention of Russell's female admirers, prompting fiance Jennifer to lay down the law and Russell to seek revenge. Meanwhile, Jeff learns an important lesson about sleep deprivation.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey's Sister
programme.desc: A surprise visit from Audrey's sister Barbara opens a window of opportunity for Russell to prove that beauty is more than what meets the eye - or at least a function of personality and good strategy.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Guy Code
programme.desc: In an effort to beef up their social agenda, Audrey persuades Jeff to double-date, which inadvertently puts the rules governed by the 'guy code' versus the 'marriage code' to the test.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Engagement Party
programme.desc: In an effort to capitalize on his commitment to Jennifer, Adam convinces Jeff to host an engagement party, which ultimately provides a lesson in 'giving' and 'receiving.' Audrey gains an unsolicited insight into her sister Barbara's single life.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Bag Ladies
programme.desc: Russell realizes the cost of dating a 'bag lady,' while Adam experiences the social peril of yielding to Jennifer's wishes and sporting a 'man bag.'.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Reality Check
programme.desc: Dog is back in Denver and in hot pursuit of a woman wanted for identity theft. The sad reality is that the identify which has been robbed is her own. She's traded in a bright future for a life on the wrong side of the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Piece of Cake
programme.desc: Being hunted by the Dog is a lousy way to celebrate your birthday but that's exactly the spot that Robert finds himself in today. He's missed his court date, quit his job, and vacated his last known address.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Prayers and Mace
programme.desc: Both brother Tim and fellow Honolulu bondsman James need Dog's help to track down their hard to find fugitives. The two cases on the docket today are challenging, especially the hunt for Gregory, a felon with a lengthy rap sheet.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: New Dog in Town
programme.desc: It's Beth's birthday and Dog knows just what she needs. He surprises Beth with Delilah, a puppy small enough to sit in the palm of her hand. Beth is so happy that she insists on taking the puppy with her on today's bounty.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Trick or Treat
programme.desc: It's Halloween, and before Dog and Beth can help the kids carve their pumpkins, they have some business to attend to. It involves knocking on doors and meeting the neighbors but instead of hunting for treats they're on the search for a fugitive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Girl Trouble
programme.desc: Dog and the team have girl trouble in this case. Krystal jumped bail and seems to have vanished into the high plains of Colorado. To make matters worse, she's running with her lover (and bond co-signer) Carrie. But Thelma and Louise they ain't.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Seeing the Light
programme.desc: Today Leland and Dog make a quick visit to the police supply store to get some new gadgets for the team but they can't linger because they've also got a fugitive to catch. Their target is reputed to have an explosive temper.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: When a Stranger Calls
programme.desc: When an offender with a long record ducks his day in court, Bobby Brown knows whom to call - The Dog!? And knowing that few souls can resist Beth's clever persuasion, Dog gives her the job of luring the fugitive in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Jack & Jill
programme.desc: Today's case is a twofer, a brother and sister both charged with drug related offenses. Also, Dog has crossed paths with the brother before. He once tried to stop Dog from arresting one of the most violent fugitives of his career.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Father Knows Pest
programme.desc: The tables are turned when the HOA comes to Jase for help to rid the neighborhood of a menacing beaver. Little Will has just gotten his learner's permit, and Willie and Si argue over which of them is the better driving instructor.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Wild Wild West Monroe
programme.desc: When Jase and Jep get into an argument over which of them is the rightful heir to their grandfather's old rifle, they decide to settle the argument with a marksmanship contest. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie help Rebecca prepare for her trip to Taiwan.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Half in the Bag
programme.desc: After Si has started moonlighting as a grocery bagger, the guys show up at the store and their teasing inadvertently causes Si to lose his job and his chance to enter a local bagging competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: There Will Be Flood
programme.desc: When a large storm hits Monroe, most of the adults head to Phil and Kay's to help protect their house from flooding while Jess, Sadie, Rebecca and Cole babysit the kids. Meanwhile, Jep, Si, Martin and Godwin try to protect the Duck Commander.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bingo Star
programme.desc: Willie accompanies Kay to a local bingo tournament and gets seduced by the game, eventually embarrassing himself and Kay with his enthusiasm.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sadie's Choice
programme.desc: Willie takes Sadie on a tour of a local college in hopes of convincing her to stay nearby after her impending high school graduation.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Children of the Cornbread
programme.desc: When the Robertson brothers debate which of their wives makes the best cornbread, it escalates into a full-on cornbread cook off. Meanwhile, when Jep, Martin, and Godwin play a practical joke on Uncle Si, it ends up being Si who has the last laugh.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Whole Lotta Bull
programme.desc: The guys enjoy a one-day rodeo fantasy camp where they learn the ins and outs of riding, roping and clowning.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Comes the Son
programme.desc: After leaving school to pursue music, Jase feels that Reed needs some structure in his life, so he hires him to take his place at Duck Commander.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bro'd Trip
programme.desc: Jase accompanies Willie on a business trip to Arkansas to pitch a new product and has unorthodox sales strategies. Back in Monroe, Jep and Si have to track down an important item of Willie's that they accidentally shipped out.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie thinks his kids have been spending too much time on their phones and other devices so he initiates a "No-Tech Week," but when he has to participate too it ends up being harder than he thought. There's a lice outbreak at Duck Command.

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: An ex-con and his adopted younger brother are forced to go on the run. Chased by a criminal, the feds, and a cadre of soldiers, their only protection is a found weapon of mysterious ancestry.

programme.title: The Philadelphia Experiment
programme.desc: A United States Navy destroyer escort participates in a Navy "invisibility" experiment that inadvertently sends two sailors forty years into the future. Starring: Michael Paré, Nancy Allen, Eric Christmas.

programme.title: Warrior
programme.desc: WARRIOR tells the moving and inspirational story of the Conlon family, Brendan (Joel Edgerton), Tommy (Tom Hardy) and Paddy (Nick Nolte), who find redemption in the ring as they fight to repair themselves and their family.

programme.title: The Winning Season: The Winning Season
programme.desc: The story of a washed up basketball coach who must learn to overcome his love of booze and his overdeveloped macho nature in order to re-invent himself as a real man and give a bunch of no-hopers a shot at a WINNING SEASON!

programme.title: Hunt to Kill: Hunt to Kill (2010)
programme.desc: When Jim's (Steve Austin of TV's WWE) teenage daughter is kidnapped, he's forced to lead a band of ruthless killers into the wilderness to retrieve their share of a missing heist score.

programme.title: The Battle of Midway: Dauntless
programme.desc: A U.S. carrier group is positioned off the coast of Midway in June 1942. During the battle, the two-man crew of a U.S. Navy dive bomber is forced to ditch in the sea. Amid the vast openness of the Pacific, the men are forced to face their own mortality.

programme.title: Chasing Christmas
programme.desc: A bitter and burned-out Ghost of Christmas Past decides to go AWOL.

programme.title: A Doggone For christmas
programme.desc: The CIA discovers a puppy with amazing abilities, they force it to become a secret weapon. When the pint-sized Jack Russell is freed from government clutches, he ends up in the loving arms of two brothers just a week before Christmas.

programme.title: The Santa Trap
programme.desc: Santa Claus winds up in jail after a 7-year-old sets a trap in order to prove his existence to her family.

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: A Crime Of Passion
programme.desc: Freddie has everything--a gorgeous new husband and half ownership of a winery. But when her business partner's wife is murdered, Freddi suspects her partner's new love.

programme.title: Family Games
programme.desc: Sloane and her boyfriend Barrett return to her childhood home determined to ruin her father Roan's re-marriage. Family secrets surface and give rise to a puzzling future.

programme.title: The Wrong Mother
programme.desc: Kelsey Larsen’s dream finally came true: beautiful twins from an in vitro procedure. But when Kelsey needs home care, the nurse she hires is none other than the egg donor herself — and the crazy woman has come to claim "her babies"!

programme.title: Draft Day
programme.desc: On the day of the NFL draft, the general manager of the Cleveland Browns must decide what he's willing to sacrifice as he angles for the number-one pick.

programme.title: The Glass Castle
programme.desc: Based on a memoir, four children struggle to grow up in a rambling, poverty-stricken, wildly unconventional environment overseen by their dysfunctional yet uniquely loving parents.

programme.title: Outlaws And Angels
programme.desc: When outlaws invade the home of a seemingly innocent, frontier family, an unexpected game of cat and mouse ensues. This leads to seduction, and ultimately bloody revenge. Starring: Chad Michael Murray, Francesca Eastwood, Luke Wilson.

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: The sons of a Colorado cattle baron, one biological and the other adopted, resent one another and fight for control of their father's cattle empire.

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Moving Out of Minnie
programme.desc: A rancher engaged to a refined woman looks for a gentle way to fire his longtime housekeeper.

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Red Flannel Shirt
programme.desc: A miner and an assayer try to short-circuit a mine owner's plans to corner the market.

programme.title: Good Witch
programme.desc: A raven-haired enchantress, Cassie Nightingale, mysteriously moves into the local haunted mansion, 'Grey House', and seems to change her neighbors lives using a hint of magic causing many to think she’s a witch.

programme.title: Foster
programme.desc: A heart-warming story of family and friendship starring Academy Award Nominee Toni Collette and Ioan Gruffudd.

programme.title: Wish Upon a Star: Wish Upon a Star (1996)
programme.desc: In this cult classic, younger sister Hayley Wheaton (Danielle Harris) wishes to switch places with her popular older sister Alexia (Katherine Heigl) and the two bickering siblings awaken to find the wish has come true.

programme.title: Your Highness
programme.desc: When Prince Fabious's bride is kidnapped, he goes on a quest to rescue her... accompanied by his lazy useless brother Thadeous.

programme.title: Whip It
programme.desc: In Bodeen, Texas, an indie-rock loving misfit finds a way of dealing with her small-town misery after she discovers a roller derby league in nearby Austin.

programme.title: Don't Ever Leave Me
programme.desc: Jack's grandfather Harry comes out of prison and stays with him in his mews flat.

programme.title: Double Exposure
programme.desc: Private detective Pete Fleming receives a call from an advertising executive.

programme.title: Dublin Nightmare
programme.desc: Irish nationalists plan to seize a security van to raise money for their movement. A photographer begins to investigate the raid and one of his friends pays a price for their actions.

programme.title: The Embezzler
programme.desc: A quiet, respectable, henpecked bank cashier learns that he has only a few years left to live. He decides to embezzle money from the bank where he works and enjoy the rest of his days in South America.

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Shatterday/A Little Peace and Quiet
programme.desc: A man named Peter Jay Novins accidentally dials his home phone number, and it's answered by Peter Jay Novins/A harried housewife finds a medallion that gives her the power to freeze time.

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Gramma/Personal Demons/Cold Reading
programme.desc: A young boy cares for his grandmother, confronting fears to step up/A screenwriter with writer's block is haunted by unseen creatures/Actors in a radio play realize their words manifest reality.

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Wordplay/Dreams For Sale/Chameleon
programme.desc: A salesman stunned as others speak jumbled English/A woman's picnic fantasy shattered/A shuttle returns with an unusual find.

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Healer/Children's Zoo/Kentucky Rye
programme.desc: Jackie steals a healing stone but loses his way/A girl's zoo visit transforms her parents' relationship/Bob enters a strange bar post-accident.

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Wong's Lost and Found Emporium
programme.desc: David Wong searches for something he lost. He seeks the Lost and Found Emporium where he finds others looking for their lost items.

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: A Twist in Time (REDUX)
programme.desc: While transporting an insane convict named "Five," Dante diverts course to answer a distress call from a graviton research station on Triton, which is experimenting with the distortion of space and time.

programme.title: Sanctuary: Out Of The Blue
programme.desc: Meet Helen and Will: neighbors on a tree-lined, suburban street. Helen lives alone, dislikes her neighbor’s dog and is a talented painter.

programme.title: Sanctuary: Into The Black
programme.desc: The Sanctuary receives alarming news that a large group of Abnormals has been spotted at the entrance to a cave in South Dakota.

programme.title: Sanctuary: Tempus
programme.desc: Adam Worth destroys Praxis and travels back in time to the 1890s to save his daughter. Dr. Magnus travels back in time to stop him before he damages the time line and destroys her future with it.

programme.title: Sanctuary: Uprising
programme.desc: With Magnus gone, Will is appointed the head of the Sanctuary Network. The abnormal uprising continues to get worse. Biggie and Kate are kidnapped. As expected the surface governments respond to the uprising with deadly force.

programme.title: Flash Gordon Conquers the Universe: Stark Treachery
programme.desc: Flash Gordon, Dale Arden and Dr. Zarkov return to the planet Mongo for an antidote to the Purple Death, which wreaking destruction on Earth. However, Ming the Merciless has other plans for them.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Beast Within
programme.desc: Malone goes after a healer that's been filled with the spirit of a demon in exchange for safe release from the village. The girls must set their differences aside and learn to trust each other.
